item.title: Counsel to the Saints and to the World
item.description:
Counsel to the Saints and to the World by President Joseph Fielding Smith, President of the Church given in the Saturday Evening session of the 142nd Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 1972
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
